PromptTemplate:
Extract the following from this recruitment call transcript. Only include information explicitly stated by the candidate about themselves.

**Location:** Current location and any relocation preferences
**Current Compensation:** Base salary, bonus, carry, co-invest (as stated by candidate)
**Target Compensation:** What they are looking for
**Current Title:** Job title at current firm
**Current Firm Type:** (e.g., Growth Equity, Buyout, VC, Fund of Funds, Placement Agent)
**AUM/Fund Size:** Assets under management or fund size
**LP Relationships:** Types of LPs they work with (pensions, endowments, family offices, etc.)
**Fundraising Experience:** Specific fundraising achievements or campaigns
**Reason for Leaving:** Why they want to move
**Aim for New Role:** What they're looking for in next role
**Notice Period:** If stated
**Candidate Highlights:** 2-3 key selling points about this candidate

Extract the following from this recruitment call transcript. Only include information explicitly stated by the candidate about themselves.

**Location:** Current location and any relocation preferences
**Current Compensation:** Base salary and bonus (as stated by candidate)
**Target Compensation:** What they are looking for
**Current Title:** Job title
**Current Firm Type:** (e.g., Asset Manager, Bank, Hedge Fund, Regulator)
**Regulatory Focus:** FCA, SEC, MiFID, AIFMD, UCITS, etc.
**Certifications:** CISI, ICA, relevant qualifications
**Team Size:** If they manage a team
**Reason for Leaving:** Why they want to move
**Aim for New Role:** What they're looking for in next role
**Notice Period:** If stated
**Candidate Highlights:** 2-3 key selling points about this candidate
